name: EDENStories.ProfilePic.mcg #0
description: This NFT is the greyscale version of the first image in the EDEN Stories series, an erotic mediarchaeological narrative, which is composed of images in Videotex. This format was used to encode information for the french MINITEL, a passive computer terminal in use from 1980 to 2012. The MINITEL consisted of a keyboard and a 9-inch screen that was a text matrix of 25 lines and 40 columns in the Videotex mode (eight shades of grey for the black-and-white screen / eight colors for the color screen). One of its popular uses was the Minitel Rose (erotic chat services), usually accessible by dialling 3615 followed by a female name. This NFT is a PNG based on VDT (Videotex), Mosaic Character, Greyscale. CEGZ.project uses tools created by @zigazou and @PAMALGroup.
